alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 15 at 1:05PM AKST until November 16 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...South winds 50 mph with gusts up to 70 mph expected. * WHERE...Bering Strait Coast. * WHEN...Until 6 PM AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strongest winds are expected in the Bering Strait this afternoon through early Wednesday morning.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
